reviewtext: i wear my sony mdr v-6 headphones at work in an office. usually they get about 4-5 hours of use a day. i must include the fact that i wear eye glasses.  i am totally satisfied with these.  they sound great and the comfort level is 10/10 even with glasses.  my head is a size 7 1/4 around and my ears are about normal size. RECOMMENDED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
